titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim January 28, 1988 and 1989, as "Day of Marti, Apostle of Liberty".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/8/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and requests the President to designate January 28, 1988 and 1989, as Day of Marti, Apostle of Liberty. (Jose Marti is remembered as "The Apostle of Cuban Independence.")
